###  Where is the problem?
Please select the category that best describes the issue:

- [ ] **Algorithm Issue** (e.g., Conflicts not detected, wrong schedule generation)
- [ ] **Data / Course Error** (e.g., Missing course, wrong time/classroom info)
- [ ] **UI Component Issue** (e.g., Broken buttons, visual glitches on a page)
- [ ] **Mobile View Issue** (e.g., Grid overflowing, layout broken on phone)
- [ ] **Other**

Briefly explain what isn't working as expected.
